data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mitroiu, Mircea-Dan (2019): Revision of Netomocera Bouček (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea: Pteromalidae), excluding the Oriental species. European Journal of Taxonomy 568: 1-87, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2019.568|213 occurrences
